page.title: 06Hobbies
page.content: Most children have a{hobby}which they enjoy in their spare time. Amongst the children at Kegworth school the most popular{hobby}was{swimming.}Sadly Kegworth lacks a pool so children must travel to Long Eaton or Loughborogh to swim. Some people collect things in their spare time. Children at Kegworth school like to collect{rubbers}and {stamps.}These are usually obtained from their freinds or family.{BMX {cycling}is another popular{pastime, lots of children visit the{BMX}track on Sideley.{Horse riding}is another popular{hobby.}The children go to a {riding school}called{Roughstones}on Long Lane, Kegworth.{Fishing}is also enjoyed by children of all ages, the river Soar is the nearest place. Further hobbies include{Football, {Cricket, Rounders}and{Tennis.
